name: Valkyrie: Ragnarok
description:
Travel the vast dark dungeon, gathering warrior souls to help with the war of Ragnarok. Optimize the character's skill system to face the numerous and fierce monsters lurking everywhere. Collect rare equipment, build unique characters with a large database of hundred skills and equipments. Play as Lilyth - a Valkyrie goddess, who collects the souls of fallen warriors. On the orders of All Gods' Father, Odin, she travels to Midgard - the human world, in an attempt to keep the balance of forces over Niflheim & Muspelheim. During the course of her mission, Lilyth encountered many strange stories, many types of demons or strange monsters that had never been seen.

Key Features

- Hundreds of skills & equipments for you to freely customize your characters
- Engaging, dramatic plot
- Rich battle system
